Name: Hail To The King
About the game: Hail to the King is a strategic single-player puzzle game. Move your pieces across a board of crumbling tiles. Find the safest path and get your King to the other side. 50 unique levels Collect 3 stars per level for bonus points Gems reveal adjacent trapped tiles Avoid Hidden Traps Knights, Bishops, Rooks and Queens can be sacrificed to crumble tiles in a familiar pattern. Localization for 12 Languages Sharpen your memory skills! Protect the King!
